insert into RESERVATION( RESERVE_IDX, RESERVE_DATE, RESERVE_CONFIRM, RESERVE_ID, RESERVE_CIDX ) VALUES( RESERVE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{RESERVE_DATE}, #{RESERVE_CONFIRM}, #{RESERVE_ID}, #{RESERVE_CIDX} );
mapper.update: update RESERVATION set RESERVE_CONFI`RM = 'N' WHERE RESERVE_NAME = #{RESERVE_ID}
update RESERVATION set RESERVE_CONFIRM = 'Y' where RESERVE_IDX = #{RESERVE_IDX}
